Title: Thalamic input to areas 3a and 2 in monkeys

@BrainMaps_Delineation.Citation: "Under ketamine and Nembutal anesthesia, single and multiunit responses to natural stimuli were recorded in one or both thalamuses of the cynomolgus monkeys, using varnish- or glass-insulated tungsten microelectrodes having tip resistances of 2-5 M-ohm, and with conventional methods for amplification and display."

@Methods.Comments: No textual information about the number of cases is given. Therefore the number of cases is counted by the Figures presenting the injections and label.

@Injections.Citation: "Injection was made into a zone of unit activity related to cutaneous receptors in the contralateral hand but spreads to involve deep zone at anterior aspect of VPLc."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: ",showing transported label in areas 3a, 3b, and 1following an injection.."

@Injections.Citation: "..with a small injection in the anterodorsal aspect of VPLc, made at a focus of unit activity related to deep receptors in the contralateral forearm and hand."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@Injections.Citation: "--with an injection in the posterodorsal aspect of VPLc, in a zone of unit activity related to deep receptors in the contralateral leg."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Transported label in cortex affects only areas 3a and 2."

@Injections.Citation: "..with a small injection of isotope in a part of VPLo.."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Transported label is confined to part of area 4 adjacent to area 3a but does not overlap into the attenuated granule cell zone."

@Injections.Citation: "..with a small injection made into a part of VPLo.."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "As a consequence of injection spreading int adjacent part of VPLc, label in posterior part of area 4 crosses into adjacent part of area 3a."

@Injections.Citation: "..showing extend of a large injection to in the hand representation of VPLc..Injection is confined to VPLc.."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "..and the distribution of thalamocortical labeling in seperate foci in areas 3a, 3b, 1, and 2."

@Injections.Citation: "..with an injection made at a focus of unit activity related to cutaneous receptors on the contralateral hand."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Transported Label is found in seperate foci only on 3b and 1."

@Injections.Citation: "..with a large injection in the ventral aspect of VPLc."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "In the cortex, transported label affcts areas 3b and 1 but not areas 3a or 2."

@Injections.Citation: "..with a large dorsally placed injection toward the posterior ends of VPLc and VPM and effecting both deep and cutaneous parts of VPLc."
@Injections.Comments: 1. The capture of the Figure clearly states the injection site. Therefore the PDC is an A. 2. Only the Volume range of injectons is stated.

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Transported label forms seperate foci in areas 3a, 3b, 1, and 2."

publication.title: Thalamic input to areas 3a and 2 in monkeys
